original_title: อยากให้เธอรู้ว่ากูติสท์
overview: Art, a young inspried high school boy who prfers his life choice as an artist, to look cool amoung girls; whereas, Foon, Art's neighbour of his age does things differently – to get a degree. Art journeys through various aspects of art and gets more sense about what he can do best about his life and love.
tagline: We need feeling to touch the art and so does love.
title: Art idol
